}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [[Atheros]] Reference Design XB116 (QCA, P/N AR5BXB116) :[[Atheros]] AR9590-AL1A chipset (codename ''Peacock'') :3T3R Mini PCIe Wi-Fi Adapter Card :Dual Band 802.11abgn (up to 450Mbps) :High Power 24dbm (200mW) MIMO 3x3
According to the [https://fccid.io/2AE3B-AEX-AR95X/Letter/Cover-Letters-20170602-v1-Family-model-declaration-letter-3459872 Family model declaration letter] on the FCC, :the following models are based on identical core design: * AEX-AR95X * AEX-AR9580-NX * AEX-AR9590-NX * AEX-AR9590-NI * AEX-AR9590-NIB
[[Category:English Documentation]]
